001001 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # addi $r0 $r0 0
111111 00000 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r0
00000000000000000000000000000000        # 0

001001 00000 00001 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r1 1
111111 00001 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r1
00000000000000000000000000000001        # 1

001001 00001 00010 0000000000000010     # addi $r1 $r2 2
111111 00010 000000000000000000011      # asrt $r2 3

001001 00010 00011 0000000000000011     # addi $r2 $r3 3
111111 00011 000000000000000000110      # asrt $r3 6

001001 00011 00100 0000000000000100     # addi $r3 $r4 4
111111 00100 000000000000000001010      # asrt $r4 10

001001 00100 00101 0000000000000101     # addi $r4 $r5 5
111111 00101 000000000000000001111      # asrt $r5 15

001001 00101 00110 0000000000000110     # addi $r5 $r6 6
111111 00110 000000000000000010101      # asrt $r6 21

001001 00110 00111 0000000000000111     # addi $r6 $r7 7
111111 00111 000000000000000011100      # asrt $r7 28

001001 00111 01000 1111111111111000     # addi $r7 $r8 -8
111111 01000 000000000000000010100      # asrt $r8 20

001001 01000 01001 1111111111110111     # addi $r8 $r9 -9
111111 01001 000000000000000001011      # asrt $r9 11

001001 01001 01010 1111111111110110     # addi $r9 $r10 -10
111111 01010 000000000000000000001      # asrt $r10 1

001001 01010 01011 1111111111110101     # addi $r10 $r11 -11
111111 01011 111111111111111110110      # asrt $r11 -10

001001 01011 01100 1111111111110100     # addi $r11 $r12 -12
111111 01100 111111111111111101010      # asrt $r12 -22

001001 01100 01101 1111111111110011     # addi $r12 $r13 -13
111111 01101 111111111111111011101      # asrt $r13 -35

001001 01101 01110 1111111111110010     # addi $r13 $r14 -14
111111 01110 111111111111111001111      # asrt $r14 -49

000101 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000   # halt
